page.title: 12HEALTH
page.content: Whilst it is said that "Country folk are healthy folk," our health is very well provided for should it ever ail. A daily surgery at Longhoughton is provided by a group practice of five doctors who also have a surgeries in Alnwick and as far north as Seahouses. We have a small infirmary in Alnwick at which consultancy clinics are held. For some ailments,however one can be referred to Ashington or Newcastle for treatment.There is also a maternity and a geriatric unit in Alnwick. Services for children and young mothers are excellent.They include several clinics and a team of health visitors. The home-help service,meals on wheels and an understanding Social Services Department help to support an increasing number of old folk.
